Penjelasan Gubernur Kalteng Sugianto Sabran soal Aksi Lempar Botol di Stadion
02 Nov 2019, 20:52 by Herianto Batubara
Jakarta - Video aksi Gubernur Kalimantan Tengah Sugianto Sabran melempar botol di tengah pertandingan sepakbola hingga dirinya marah ke Kapolres Palangka Raya AKBP Timbul RK Siregar viral di media sosial. Dia pun memberi penjelasan.
Sugianto menjelaskan, dirinya menonton pertandingan antara Kalteng Putra versus Persib Bandung di Stadion Tuah Pahoe, Palangka Raya, Jumat (1/11) malam. Dia antusias berharap malam itu menyuguhkan pertandingan yang indah dan fair.
Namun menurut Sugianto, pertandingan tersebut berjalan tidak seperti yang dia harapkan. Dia mengatakan, wasit yang memimpin pertandingan tidak profesional. Pertandingan itu sendiri berakhir dengan skor 2-0 untuk kemenangan Persib.
"Saya kepinginnya melihat permainan yang cantik oleh kedua tim antara Kalteng Putra vs Persib. Saya kurang tahu menit keberapa. Tapi sejak awal Wasit yang memimpin pertandingan tidak fair," kata Sugianto saat dihubungi detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
"Kalau Persib yang melakukan pelanggaran diingatkan saja, tapi ketika Kalteng Putra langsung melakukan pelanggaran diberikan kartu kuning dan ini terjadi beberapa kali kali sampai pada akhirnya pemain Kalteng Putra diberikan kartu merah. Kan persib yang melakukan kesalahan kenapa kartu merah diberikan sepihak dan Kalteng Putra beberapa kali permainan dirugikan oleh wasit. Kalau nggak salah 4 kali," jelasnya.
Sugianto berharap aksi pelemparan botol tersebut tidak dijadikan polemik. Dia mengatakan, lebih dari itu dirinya sebenarnya resah akan kondisi sepakbola di Indonesia yang menurutnya masih bermasalah.
"Sebetulnya itu cuma mengingatkan. Wajar menurut saya daripada masyarakat Kalteng yang marah dan bebrapa kali tidak pernah berubah. Mau jadi apa persepakbolaan Indonesia kalau begini terus kepemimpinan wasit dan PSSI tidak berani mengambil tindakan tegas," jelasnya.
Selain itu, Sugianto juga memberi penjelasan soal video dirinya marah kepada AKBP Timbul Siregar. Dia juga meminta peristiwa tersebut tidak dibesar-besarkan karena menurutnya tidak ada masalah.
"Mengenai Kapolres itu, Beliau yang menunjuk dan meminta saya turun. Saya turun waktu itu. Sebetulnya nggak ada masalah. Saya kan bapaknya Pak Kapolres juga, jadi sangat bijak saya datangi dan meminta maaf. Tapi bukan karena saya salah," ujarnya.
Sugianto menambahkan, inti dari peristiwa tersebut adalah wujud keprihatinannya terhadap kondisi persepakbolaan di Indonesia. Dia berharap ke depan masa depan sepakbola di Indonesia bisa lebih baik dan profesional.
"Prihatin dengan keadaan sepakbola Indonesia. Saya berpikir pemerintah daerah capek-capek mengurus bola, oknum di PSSI dan wasitnya tidak pernah berubah," ucapnya menyesalkan.
Sebelumnya Kadis Kominfo Provinsi Kalteng Herson B Aden juga sudah memberi penjelasan soal peristiwa tersebut. Menurutnya Gubernur Kalteng Sugianto Sabran kecewa dengan jalannya pertandingan.
"Saya tidak berada di lokasi, yang pasti Pak Gubernur sangat kecewa dengan sistem perwasitan dalam pertandingan tersebut," kata Kadis Kominfo Provinsi Kalteng Herson B Aden saat dihubungi detikcom, Sabtu (2/11).
"Semua diakhiri dengan baik kok, tidak ada keributan bahkan Pak Gubernur lamgsung menghampiri tim Persib Bandung setelah usai pertandingan," ucapnya.
Herson kemudian membagikan momen-momen Sugianto Sabran usai pertandingan. Sugianto tampak menyapa hangat seluruh suporter dan pemain dari kedua tim. Dia juga menyapa dan foto bersama dengan sejumlah suporter Persib Bandung.
Di video itu, Sugianto juga menyalami para aparat yang melakukan pengamanan, termasuk dengan AKBP Timbul Siregar.

Central Kalimantan Governor Sugianto Sabran's explanation about the Bottle Throwing Action at the Stadium
02 Nov 2019, 20:52 by Herianto Batubara
Jakarta - Video of the action of Central Kalimantan Governor Sugianto Sabran throws a bottle in the middle of a football match until he is angry at the Palangkaraya Police Chief AKBP Timbul RK Siregar viral on social media. He also gave an explanation.
Sugianto explained, he watched the match between Kalteng Putra versus Persib Bandung at Tuah Pahoe Stadium, Palangka Raya, Friday (1/11) night. He enthusiastically hopes that the night will present a beautiful and fair match.
But according to Sugianto, the match went not as he had hoped. He said, the referee who led the match was not professional. The match itself ended with the score 2-0 to win Persib.
"I want to see a beautiful game by the two teams between Kalteng Putra vs. Persib. I don't know how many minutes. But from the beginning the referee who led the match was unfair," Sugianto said when contacted by AFP on Saturday (11/02/2019).
"If Persib who commits violations is reminded, but when Kalteng Putra immediately commits the violation is given a yellow card and this happens several times until in the end Kalteng Putra players are given a red card. Kan Persib who made a mistake why the red card was given unilaterally and Kalteng Putra several times "The game is harmed by the referee. If I'm not mistaken 4 times," he explained.
Sugianto hopes that the bottle throwing action will not become a polemic. He said, more than that he was actually anxious about the condition of football in Indonesia which he said was still problematic.
"Actually, it is just a reminder. It seems natural to me that the people of Central Kalimantan are angry and have never changed. How can Indonesian football become like this if the referee leadership continues and PSSI does not dare to take decisive action," he explained.
In addition, Sugianto also gave an explanation about the video he was angry with AKBP Timbul Siregar. He also requested that the incident not be exaggerated because according to him there was no problem.
"Regarding the police chief, he pointed out and asked me to come down. I went down at that time. There was actually no problem. I was the father of the police chief too, so it was wise for me to go and apologize. But not because I was wrong," he said.
Sugianto added, the essence of the incident was a form of his concern over the condition of football in Indonesia. He hopes in the future the future of football in Indonesia can be better and more professional.
"Concerned about the state of Indonesian football. I think the local government is tired of taking care of the ball, unscrupulous at PSSI and the referee has never changed," he said regretfully.
Previously the Head of Kadis Kominfo of Central Kalimantan Province Herson B Aden had also given an explanation of the incident. According to him, Central Kalimantan Governor Sugianto Sabran was disappointed with the game.
"I was not at the location, certainly the Governor was very disappointed with the referee system in the match," said Kadis Kominfo Central Kalimantan Province Herson B Aden when contacted by AFP on Saturday (2/11).
"All ended well, there was no commotion, even the Governor directly arrived at the Persib Bandung team after the match," he said.
Herson then shared Sugianto Sabran's moments after the match. Sugianto seemed to greet all the fans and players from both teams warmly. He also greeted and took a photo together with a number of supporters of Persib Bandung.
In the video, Sugianto also greeted the security forces, including AKBP Timbul Siregar.
